function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Climatic data gaps due to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased pollution in city air and water bodies","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"International flights almost standing still due to lockdowns, reducing noise pollution from air traffic.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction of co2 emissions due to lockdown measures","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of rebound in co2 emissions after lockdown is lifted","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in emissions leading to improved air quality","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of lockdown on pollution levels in major cities","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Temporary reduction in co2 and no2 emissions due to lockdown","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in no2 emissions due to decreased industrial activity and transportation","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction of nitrogen dioxide no2 emissions due to industrial and vehicular operations coming to a halt during the pandemic","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Radical drop in no2 emissions in italy, china, and india","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing air quality in many polluted cities due to covid-19 lockdown","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Water pollution reduction due to covid-19 lockdown","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of waste management in building and construction projects","category":"Waste Management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient deconstruction and demolition processes","category":"Waste Management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper material recovery and reuse practices","category":"Waste Management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding long-lasting consequences of the covid-19 pandemic on building specifications and design.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases at building sites","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emerging technology built by the transition of functions from biological systems","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Biomimetic transformation into a technical circumstance of the natural life cycle","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bio-mimicked products and methods need analysis","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of hazardous materials in construction","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient energy consumption in construction","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate waste management in construction","category":"Waste Management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Flaws in urban infrastructure reducing resilience to food insecurity and promoting unsafe physical activity","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased physical activity in public spaces may lead to greater risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal settlements and urban poor may not have access to safe physical activity options at home","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated air exhaust outlets leading to deposition of virus-laden droplets on equipment such as vents","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning of environmental surfaces in healthcare facilities","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Environmental contamination with sars-cov-2 in patient rooms and facilities","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral shedding in stool as a potential route of transmission for sars-cov-2","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Nosocomial transmission of sars-cov-2 due to environmental contamination","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain mode of transmission and extent of environmental contamination","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of specific cleaning chemicals in routine cleaning","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Geographic spread of west nile virus and lyme disease","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence and re-emergence of tick-and mosquito-borne diseases in canada due to climate change","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vector-borne diseases responding differently to long-term changes in temperature and rainfall patterns","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence and spread of new mosquito-borne and tick-borne pathogens in canada due to climate change","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrant women working in hard-hit service sectors","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poorer housing conditions with higher incidences of overcrowding","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Living in areas with higher population density","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imposition of a 25% import tariff may disrupt global trade and supply chains, leading to economic instability and reduced access to essential goods.","category":"Economy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global supply chain disruptions due to unpredictable shocks","category":"Economy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerability of industries to disruptions in global supply chains","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of diversified supply chains leading to dependency on specific regions or countries","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate stockpiles of essential goods","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneity of technical standards leading to obstacles in substitution between suppliers","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentration of exports or imports in some industries","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Specific assets and knowledge capital involved in supplier base","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Small open economies relying more on foreign inputs and markets","category":"Economy","confidence":"Medium"}]}
